channel.title: Multivariate time series on Complexity Methods for Behavioural Science

item.title: Day 4 schedule
item.description: Today’s Topics: Cross-RQA Quantifying synchronisation and coupling strength Analysis of leader-follower behavior and coupling direction Introduction to recurrence networks Tentative time table for Day 2 When What Who Topics Notes 09.00-10.30 Quantifying interaction dynamics of coupled systems FH Cross-RQA 10.30-11.00 Coffee/Tea 11.00-12.00 Assignments Cross-RQA, Diagonal recurrence profiles, Surrogate analysis 12.

item.title: Day 5 schedule
item.description: Today’s Topics: The idiographic system method in psychopathology Process monitoring (experience sampling) Dynamic complexity (Multiplex) Recurrence networks Early warning signals of phase transitions in multivariate time series data Tentative time table for Day 5 When What Who Topics Notes 09:00-10:00 Intro Idiographic Methods FH 10:00-10:30 Dynamic complexity as an early warning signal in psychopathology MO 10.
